description:
In this course I will teach you the essential fundamentals and intermediate skills so that you can learn how to increase Productivity with the Windows 7 Operating System.

The course is a collection of screen cast videos broken up into short bite size tips that you can implement immediately in your use of Windows 7. Most videos are between 2 and 3 minutes long while some of the more technical videos are a little longer. Don't worry you don't need to sit through any long boring explanation videos!

The course can be completed at your own pace and contains about 3 hours of video.

The only requirements for taking this course is a computer that runs the Windows 7 Operating System and a desire to increase your productivity and technical skills.
title: Windows 7 Productivity Essentials
